name: musashi-wasm
description: WebAssembly port of the Musashi M68000 CPU emulator with optional Perfetto tracing support
author: Musashi Contributors

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:lib
scripts.build:wasm: npm run build:wasm:standard && npm run build:wasm:perfetto
scripts.build:wasm:standard: cd .. && ./build_wasm_simple.sh && cp musashi-node.out.wasm npm-package/dist/musashi.wasm && cp musashi-node.out.wasm.map npm-package/dist/musashi.wasm.map
scripts.build:wasm:perfetto: cd .. && ./build_perfetto_wasm_simple.sh && cp musashi-node.out.wasm npm-package/dist/musashi-perfetto.wasm && cp musashi-node.out.wasm.map npm-package/dist/musashi-perfetto.wasm.map
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist lib
